“Working together when appropriate should never be confused with endorsing or even accepting such a malodorous regime.” https://nationalinterest.org/blog/middle-east-watch/welcome-saudi-arabia-first-campaign-36757
Heidi and I wish the Jewish people a very Happy Hanukkah. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dta_9KEV4AAbxKh.jpg

It is fitting that this year Hanukkah comes against the backdrop of the one-year anniversary of the United States acknowledging Jerusalem as Israel’s capital, and it will also be the first Hanukkah since we moved our embassy to its rightful place there.
This holiday celebrates the heroic revolt and triumph of the Maccabees, who liberated the historic land of Judea, rededicated the Second Temple in Jerusalem, and restored the right to worship freely.
The Jewish people will come together this evening to light candles beginning the eight days of observance of #Hanukkah, the Festival of Lights, and remember the great miracle that happened in Israel.

I'm glad that @HouseDemocrats are planning to make anti-corruption a priority in the next Congress. Together, we can make our government work for everyone, not just the wealthy and well-connected. Beautiful recounting of 41’s final hours. Rest In Peace, Mr. President. https://twitter.com/dickstevenson/status/1068948266119766017 QT @dickstevenson Mr. Bush suddenly grew alert, his eyes wide open. “Where are we going, Bake?” he asked.

“We’re going to heaven,” Mr. Baker answered.

“That’s where I want to go,” Mr. Bush said. ⁦@peterbakernyt⁩  https://nyti.ms/2zAIUBi?smid=nytcore-ios-share

Tax fairness for the middle class. Quality, affordable health care. Making sure students don’t leave college with crippling debt. We can’t lose sight of these critical issues.

I condemn the Iranian regime’s test of a dangerous missile that can carry multiple nuclear warheads. Having reimposed Iran sanctions, Congress should now expand them, and also pass the United States-Israel Security Assistance Authorization Act (S. 2497). https://twitter.com/SecPompeo/status/1068904393821573120 QT @SecPompeo The Iranian regime has just test-fired a medium range ballistic missile that’s capable of carrying multiple warheads.  This test violates UNSCR 2231.   Iran’s missile testing & missile proliferation is growing. We condemn this act and call upon Iran to cease these activities.
